name: Simulation Simulator (vpeter1119, breitiadam, andrasadam93)
description:
Bradley does not know that he's living in a simulation. And that must remain so.

Manage the simulation by adding and removing elements while keeping an eye out for your RAM capacity. Be careful! When Bradley's Suspicion meter fills up, he will realize that he's living in a simulation and the game is over.

Main Objective:

  • Maintain the simulation as long as you can (before Bradley's suspicion reaches 100)
  • Beware, as time progresses it will be harder to keep Bradley sane

Gameplay:

  • Bradley will announce and then move to a room
  • You have to add objects to that room so that Bradley keeps living the dream
    • Bradley expects 2 objects to be in the room when he arrives
    • Bradley expects 1 object NOT to be in the room when he arrives
    • Bradley expects a certain number of objects in the room. Not more, not less
  • Some objects will be riddled with bugs. Remove or fix them before Bradley sees them
  • Avoid placing objects right on front of Bradley. He is dense, but the simulation must go on
  • Beware, you can only maintain 10 objects at once

Controls:

  • WASD (or cursor-to-edge) to move the camera around
  • Left Mouse Button to select, place or fix an object
  • Right Mouse Button to deselect or remove an object

Full-screen on ultrawide monitors is not recommended.
